author: bfonta
body:
#### PR description:

Added a new offset to test multiple process modifiers combined: ```ticl_barrel```, ```ticl_v5```, ```ngtScouting``` and ```alpaka```. All the other configuration options mimic the existing ```.77```.

##### Tests

```runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade --show -e -l 29634.771```
title: Add a relval test for the NGT scouting menu with multiple process modifiers
